byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Hull conf with Brit econ experts; comments; dual rate poses question for U S customs officials
snippet: WASHINGTON, April 1--The concern of the United States over any attempt to stimulate British exports by means of currency depreciation has been conveyed to the British Government by way of British experts now conferring here, Secretary of State Cor...

headline.main: POUND FALL POSES CUSTOMS PROBLEM; Treasury Is Thought Likely to Protect Trade by Ordering Continued Official Rate TWO FIGURES NOW QUOTED Hull Says Concern of America Over Depreciation Has Been Conveyed to London

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 1--The concern of the United States over any attempt to stimulate British exports by means of currency depreciation has been conveyed to the British Government by way of British experts now conferring here, Secretary of State Cordell Hull indicated at his press conference today.
